code: /* (non-Javadoc)      * @see java.lang.Throwable#getMessage()      */ @Override public String getMessage() {     char character = name.charAt(index).     String invalidChar = "" + character.     if (Character.isISOControl(character)) {         invalidChar = String.format("\\u%04x", (int) character).     }     return "Invalid character '" + invalidChar + "' at index " + index. }

comment: /**  * Returns the invalid AS2 name  *  * @return the invalid AS2 name  */
code: /**  * Returns the invalid AS2 name  *  * @return the invalid AS2 name  */ public String getName() {     return name. }

comment: /** * Returns the index of the invalid character in name * * @return the index of the invalid character in name */
code: /** * Returns the index of the invalid character in name * * @return the index of the invalid character in name */ public int getIndex() { return index. }
